Method.name: OnNew
Method.Implementation:
quit:$get(model)="" $$$ERROR("Supply an instance of an active record model.")
set ..className = model.%ClassName(1) set sql = "select SqlSchemaName,SqlTableName from %Dictionary.CompiledClass where ID='"_..className_"'"
set query = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%New() set qStatus = query.%Prepare(sql)
if qStatus '= 1 { quit $$$ERROR("Could not prepare SQL statement. Statement was:"_$MVVM_sql) }
set recordSet = query.%Execute()
while recordSet.%Next() { set ..tableName = recordSet.%Get("SqlSchemaName")_"."_recordSet.%Get("SqlTableName") quit }
quit:..tableName="" $$$ERROR("Unable to resolve SQL table name. Does the model ultimately extend EasyCSP.Model.Base?")
set modelAttributes = model.getAttributes() set finder = "" for { set finder = $mvoconv(modelAttributes.Next("finder"), "MCL") quit:finder=""
set attribute = modelAttributes.GetAt(finder)
set ..attributes = ..attributes _ $listBuild(finder) set ..columnLabels = ..columnLabels _ $listBuild(attribute.label) set ..columnNames = ..columnNames _ $listBuild(attribute.sqlFieldName)
set:attribute.order=0 ..idColumn = attribute.sqlFieldName }
quit $$$OK
